title: Cognitive Apprenticeship Model-Based Intensive Short-Term Course for Media and Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and General Awareness of Social Issues
context.additional_context: Emphasis on Practical Information Literacy Skills Optimized for Mobile Environments for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Distinguish fake news from credible information using at least four information evaluation tools
Produce a 2-minute smart device video analyzing algorithm bias cases and explaining their societal impact
Critically evaluate information bias by comparatively analyzing three recent news articles on climate change

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
